text.div:
Primary Or Uncertain Behavior Cancer Disorder

Types of primary malignant neoplastic disease, coded in SNOMED CT. Use a code from the disorder hierarchy under SNOMED CT 363346000 'Malignant neoplastic disease (disorder)' excluding codes descending from SNOMED CT 128462008 'Secondary malignant neoplastic disease (disorder)'. If body location is not precoordinated (i.e., implied by the code), the site of the primary tumor should be specified in the body site attribute.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 363346000
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 128462008

name: PrimaryOrUncertainBehaviorCancerDisorder
title: Primary Or Uncertain Behavior Cancer Disorder
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
